initial_question.title: Is there any step necesary for getting Field Data and Origin Summary to show stats
initial_question.body: I already have search console  and google analytics, is there an additional step in order to display in the future those indicators?

initial_question.title: How to grab/pass the 5 audit score categories
initial_question.body:
<!-- We would love to hear anything on your mind about Lighthouse -->
**Summary**
Im trying to find the code related to audit scores of the following categories:
"id": "performance"
"id": "pwa"
"id": "accessibility"
"id": "Best-Practices"
"id": "seo"
I need to grab these audit score results and return them similarly to how the following metrics have functions to return their results. 
 - `ttfcp` - First Contentful Paint
 - `ttfmp` - First Meaningful Paint
 - `psi` - Perceptual Speed Index
 - `fv` - First Visual Change
 - `vc` - Visually Complete 100%
 - `ttfi` - First Interactive (vBeta)
 - `ttci` - Time to Consistently Interactive (vBeta)
 - `vc85` - Visually Complete 85%

Is there any existing code within the project that will help me accomplish this? Any recommendations on how I could accomplish this otherwise? I would like to get the five audit scores I mentioned above, in addition to the available metrics, and update a google spreadsheet with the scores after running the lighthouse test.

satisfaction_conditions: Successfully retrieves all 5 audit category scores (performance, pwa, accessibility, best-practices, seo)
Returns numeric score values for each category
Works with Lighthouse's JSON output format

initial_question.title: how to use existing audits inside a custom audit?
initial_question.body: So I am using lighthouse for custom audits by extending the audits class. I am wondering if its possible to use another existing audits inside my custom audit class? or I have to rely only on gatherers.

satisfaction_conditions: Custom audit must be able to access functionality from existing audits
Solution must work within Lighthouse's audit extension system
Audit results must be accessible and usable within the custom audit context
Implementation must handle asynchronous audit execution
Solution must maintain version compatibility awareness
